title: Similar typefaces to this script font?
content:
Hi!

I need to find fonts that a similar to this script font. This one is probably a custom designed logotype, but it doesn't have to be exactly like this. Just something which is tasting a little "vintage, 50s and pin-up".

Probably a weird description — but any suggestions are welcome!

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cfcdc4fb6a303d4bfe34132bc6c40830.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019131056/http:/typophile.com/files/cfcdc4fb6a303d4bfe34132bc6c40830.jpeg) | 43.79 KB |
author: ThomasB

comments.content: Try Sarah Script by Charles Borges.

Feels " [Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019131056/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/sudtipos/fonts)" to me. Very close to [Buffet Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019131056/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/buffet-script/) using some stylistic alternates... You may like [Storefront](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019131056/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/storefront-pro/) too.
